name: The Silver Bullet P.I.
description: This project is meant to recreate the drama of the 1940s and bring film noir to the modern age. A team of five 3D modelers, including myself, have set up the office of The Silver Bullet, a private investigator from the inner city. You will be able to explore his office as he's off trying to take matters into his own hands. He’s a loose cannon but he’ll get the job done.
